name: nativescript-emoji-picker
description: The first and only emoji picker for NativeScript!

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.build.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns build android
scripts.build.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns build android
scripts.build.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns build iOS
scripts.build.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns build iOS
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && node_modules\.bin\ngcc --properties es2015 module main --first-only && tns debug android --env.aot --no-hmr
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.android.clean: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --clean
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-emoji-picker && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-emoji-picker && tns plugin add ../src
